017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
021
022import java.net.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
028
029/**
030 * Represents an <c>atomIcon</c> construct in the RFC4287 specification.
031 *
032 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
033 * <p class='bschema'>
034 *    atomIcon = element atom:icon {
035 *       atomCommonAttributes,
036 *       (atomUri)
037 *    }
038 * </p>
039 *
040 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
041 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
042 * </ul>
043 */
044@Bean(typeName="icon")
045@FluentSetters
046public class Icon extends Common {
047
048   private URI uri;
049
050
051   /**
052    * Normal constructor.
053    *
054    * <p>
055    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
056    * Strings must be valid URIs.
057    *
058    * <p>
059    * URIs defined by {@link UriResolver} can be used for values.
060    *
061    * @param uri The URI of the icon.
062    */
063   public Icon(Object uri) {
064      setUri(uri);
065   }
066
067   /** Bean constructor. */
068   public Icon() {}
069
070
071   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
072   // Bean properties
073   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
074
075   /**
076    * Bean property getter:  <property>uri</property>.
077    *
078    * <p>
079    * The URI of this icon.
080    *
081    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
082    */
083   @Xml(format=ELEMENTS)
084   public URI getUri() {
085      return uri;
086   }
087
088   /**
089    * Bean property setter:  <property>uri</property>.
090    *
091    * <p>
092    * The URI of this icon.
093    *
094    * <p>
095    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
096    * Strings must be valid URIs.
097    *
098    * @param value
099    *    The new value for this property.
100    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
101    * @return This object
102    */
103   public Icon setUri(Object value) {
104      this.uri = toURI(value);
105      return this;
106   }
107
108   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
109   // Overridden setters (to simplify method chaining)
110   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
111
112   // <FluentSetters>
113
114   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
115   public Icon setBase(Object value) {
116      super.setBase(value);
117      return this;
118   }
119
120   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
121   public Icon setLang(String value) {
122      super.setLang(value);
123      return this;
124   }
125
126   // </FluentSetters>
127}
